notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: All authors contributed to the conception and design of the study; P.N. collected the plant material and performed distillation and data analysis; K.N. and M.J.O.-C. advised on the “Volatile section” for both the methods and discussion; P.N. wrote the first draft of the manuscript; C.R. and K.T. advised on Synchrotron FTIR sample preparation and FTIR data analysis; C.R., K.T., S.T., K.N. and M.J. reviewed and edited the manuscript. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
